--vso.description: Used for CI builds. Note that colorization of build output is now controlled by the --color flag.

--npm.description: For doing builds that will be published to NPM

--ship.description: Perform a production build, including minification and localization steps

--minimal.description: Perform a fast build, which disables certain tasks such as unit tests and linting

--color.description: Enable or disable colors in the build log, defaults to 'true'

enumValues.name: true
enumValues.description: Displays colors in the build log

enumValues.name: false
enumValues.description: Disables all colors in build log, useful for CI builds
